posts.post_content:
Looking for the above Evers example.  Please let me know if you have one to deal.  Willing to buy or trade for other Brown Hindu cards.

Mark

I have one I could trade for another HOFer with a Hindu back. Email or ping me and let me know what you have. 

David R

Still looking for the Evers Brown Hindu Portrait...thanks.

Mark
